items.description: The wine list at Bestia changes to some extent daily. We focus on producers and geographies that range from classical and known to vanguard and emerging. We forgo the inclusion of wines that are solely commercial. We strive for a balance that aptly supplies something for everyone while remaining dedicated to enhancing your experience here as a whole. We would be happy to forward you today's list. Please send requests to info@bestiala.com.
items.name: Wine List
Kolsch. Brauerei Heinrich Reissdorf. Cologne. Germany.

White Ale. Telegraph Brewing Co. Santa Barbara. Usa.

Ayinger Brauweisse Hefeweizen. Brauerei Aying. Munich. Germany.
American Ipa. Bell's Brewery. Kalamazoo. Usa.

items.description: Adding the charge directly to the check is the only legal way for us to assist in raising the standards of non-tipped employees. Thank you for supporting our staff. If you would like this charge removed, simply let your server know or feel free to adjust your gratuity accordingly. Menus displayed are samples only. Actual menus and prices are subject to change at any time and may not reflect what is currently available.
items.name: A 4% Charge Is Added to All Checks to Benefit Our Back of the House Employees.

provider.attributionText: Disclaimer: Always check with the business for pricing and availability of menu items. SinglePlatform is not responsible for menu or pricing changes, but the information is believed to be accurate when posted. Listing of a menu does not mean that there is any affiliation, endorsement or sponsorship between SinglePlatform and the listed business.
provider.name: singleplatform
